verse: अर्थोऽयं ब्रह्मसूत्राणां सर्वोपनिषदामपि गायत्रीभाष्यरूपोऽसौ वेदार्थपरिबृंहितः पुराणानां साररूपः साक्षाद् भगवतोदितः। ग्रंथोऽष्टादशसाहस्त्रः श्रीमद्भागवताभिघः

terms.गायत्रीभाष्यरूपः: in the form of the Gayatri commentary
terms.वेदार्थपरिबृंहितः: encompassing the meanings of the Vedas

meaning:
This (Bhagavata Purana) is the essence of the meanings of the Brahma Sutras and all Upanishads, presented in the form of a commentary on the Gayatri, and it directly declares the essence of the Puranas as revealed by the Bhagavata. This text, exceeding eighteen thousand verses, surpasses the Bhagavata in its significance."

In summary, the verse highlights the significance of the Bhagavata Purana, portraying it as the essence of the Brahma Sutras, Upanishads, and Puranas, presented through a commentary on the Gayatri. It emphasizes the authoritative declaration of the Bhagavata and its substantial content, surpassing even the Bhagavata itself in significance.
